review: Simple to set up and easy to use.  I have two flat TV's that are not "smart" TV's.  Being able to move the Stick from one TV to another is very convenient.  The remote is small, intuitive, and easy to use.  The only small issue I have is the placement of the power adapter plug halfway up the body of the stick.  The wire is pointing up awkwardly when plugged into the back of the TV.  I would suggest the next generation have the power plug on the end on the Stick to lessen the stress of the plug and wire.  Also, supplying a longer USB power wire would be a welcome plus.
